turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! Could you order coffee from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Which Starbucks branch would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks at South Main Street, Graham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Today, I'm gonna have the caffe mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome! Do you want the short, tall, grande or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me see. Can you tell me how much calories does the venti have compared to tall size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just a moment, pls. Let me check for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like the venti has 450 calories while the tall size has 290 calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the serving size for the venti?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti will be 20 fluid ounces.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll have the venti then pls.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like milk added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes, I'll have Almond milk with it. I trying to avoid animal milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes pls.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to confirm I got it right. You want venti sized caffe mocha, with Almond milk and whipped cream to be ordered from Starbucks at South Main Street, Graham?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you got it right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order of caffe mocha has been ordered and ready for pick up shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hat's all. Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Have a great day. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too. Goodbye.
